alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 13 at 8:49PM MST until August 13 at 10:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR WESTERN MOHAVE COUNTY... At 849 PM MST, Mohave County gauge reports and cameras indicated flash flooding continues over White Hills Road at Detrital Wash with 2 to 3 feet of water flowing in the wash. This same wash crosses Temple Bar Road about 8 miles west of Temple Bar Marina. Flash flooding is ongoing and will likely make Temple Bar Road impassable through at least 1030 pm. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Temple Bar Road and White Hills road at Detrital Wash FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
